sections.heading: writer; exemption from licensure
sections.text: A person who is a keno writer and has no direct responsibility for the selection of numbers shall not be considered a lottery worker and shall not be required to be licensed for purposes of the Nebraska County and City Lottery Act.SourceLaws 2014, LB259, ยง 5.

9-631.02.Keno writer; exemption from licensure.

A person who is a keno writer and has no direct responsibility for the selection of numbers shall not be considered a lottery worker and shall not be required to be licensed for purposes of the Nebraska County and City Lottery Act.

SourceLaws 2014, LB259, ยง 5.
